attributes.action: Bring back Boris Johnson as PM
attributes.additional_details:
I think parliament should get Boris back in a PM as the UK is in critical need of someone who can sort this issues out family’s are struggling we are becoming the worse country within history.

If Boris can do brexit and other PMs carnt also do a lot for the NHS I would also like to mention he is very much for the people. As he came out giving cups of teas to workers and supported people like a PM should.
Boris had a good team behind him and new how to address the public it.
attributes.background:
Boris has worked hard for this Country and throughout out covid he had the hardest job as a PM within the 21st century.
Through out covid there was parties and why couldn’t the PM have one to we didn’t lose our jobs over this there was people out there braking the rules but still went back to work.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes requests about how is Prime Minister.

In any case, decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
